overview.name: Overview
overview.title: Self-serve analytics. No need to get engineers or data team involved.
overview.description:
PostHog can automatically track user interactions in {companyName} with autocapture.

Tag and organize events how you like, then see how users interact with your app so you can make informed product decisions.

product_analytics.name: Product Analytics
product_analytics.title: Create trends, funnels and other insights without asking your engineers to instrument events
product_analytics.description: PostHog automatically tracks pageviews, clicks, rage clicks, and more, then makes it easy to visualize these with insights Product Managers will be familiar with.

all_in_one.name: All-in-one
all_in_one.title: PostHog apps have great synergy
all_in_one.description: Identify a trend, see what happened, assign issues – all in one place.

content.title: Product Analytics
content.description: Easily uncover user friction by following the drop-offs in a funnel.

content.title: Session Replay
content.description: Watch session recordings to understand friction in the user experience.

content.title: Error Tracking
content.description: Assign issues to engineers to get user problems solved quickly.

surveys.name: Surveys
surveys.title: Track key metrics like NPS & CSAT
surveys.description: Trigger in-app surveys to measure the trends over time, collect user feedback, and get AI summaries of the results.

revenue_analytics.name: Revenue Analytics
revenue_analytics.title: Correlate revenue data with product metrics
revenue_analytics.description: Get a deeper understanding of what drives revenue growth in your product. It’s only a few clicks to integrate most data sources and then you’ll be able to enrich your user data with additional metrics without a data team.

max_ai.name: Max AI
max_ai.title: Ask questions about your product usage
max_ai.description: We create the insights for you, all you need to do is ask Max AI questions about your product.

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: PostHog offers usage-based pricing. This means you only pay for what you use, and you can set billing limits so you never get an unexpected bill.

cta.name: Get a demo
cta.title: Get a demo
cta.description: No demos required – you can try PostHog without ever talking to us. But if you'd like personalized demo, book a time.
